tip.sword_soaring.learn: You've learned someone's secrets, now you can fly with your sword!
skill.sword_soaring.sword_soaring.toolti: Hold down the space to fly on the sword, release the space to stop. Consume stamina. Protect the next falling damage.
skill.sword_soaring.rain_screen.tooltip: Right-click to Kick away the surrounding enemies and summon 4 swords around for 10 seconds. Sword screen can guard against all attacks. Each attack consumes one sword. If the sword touches an entity, it will cause damage and heal owner.
skill.sword_soaring.rain_cutter.tooltip: Within 10 seconds after executing weapon innate, basic attack will summon three swords to track and hurt target.
config.sword_soaring.fly_speed_scale: the ratio of flying speed to view vector
config.sword_soaring.stamina_consume_per: the stamina consumed per tick when flying
